name: worms.bas
title: WORMS! With Human Heads
author: Ben Piko
specs:
Mode 13 graphics
Keyboard, PC speaker
QBasic
usage:
Ctrl/Alt - move
Shift - jump
Space - magic
S - sound
Esc - exit
notes:
Press shift+R to start.
Need Insert+NumLock on to move
Runs fast.
